content: In my review I had suggested to state the results more generally for factored numbers (and deduce them for smooth numbers from the more general ones). WIth the agreement of @Ralf Stephan, I have done so now myself. So it would be good if somebody else could have a look, since I think I should not be the one who puts it on the maintainer merge queue now.
What's the deal with #13115 vs #13196? The latter PR looks like a very slight variant of some lemmas from the former, and it's not clear who wants what reviewed and/or merged...
I think #13196 just contains the code I suggested in my comments on #13115. After adding this (and more) to #13115, #13196 is no longer relevant, I would say (it is marked WIP anyway).
Sorry, forgot to change labels on #13115 (now "awaiting review").
LGTM; I've flagged it for maintainer merge. If the maintainers agree and it gets merged, then I guess we can close #13196.
I'm afraid I closed/deleted it already before your post, sorry.

Ralf Stephan said:

I'm afraid I closed/deleted it already before your post, sorry.

No need to apologise â€“ I just didn't want to risk causing you offence as the PR author by suggesting deleting it until it was definitely no longer relevant.
